entry.title: Autologin
trendMicro
entry.content:
另外一個版本的產品已被安裝

HKLM\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\TrendMicro HKLM\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\ HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Installer\UserData\S-1-5-18\Products\

Error 1316

https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/000283081 HKLM\SOFTWARE\Classes\Installer\Products\1EFA14817AB44D447800A6FC68A0E81D\SourceList\ PackageName XXX.msi

entry.title: HIDScript
Cmd_beep_sound
entry.content: Set-PSReadlineOption -BellStyle Visual

entry.title: Faker
imageMagick
entry.content:
find /tmp/tmp/cc -name "*.JPG" -exec mogrify -format png {} \;

convert /tmp/covid19.png -gravity southeast -pointsize 20 label:"2021/06/03 14:54" -composite /tmp/covid191.png

entry.title: Convert
entry.content: convert [path] -trim +repage -quality 80 -resize ‘800x600’ -gravity center -background transparent -extent 800x600 [path]

entry.title: Gdrive
entry.content:
https://github.com/prasmussen/gdrive

ref https://atceiling.blogspot.com/2020/02/raspberry-pi-57google-drive.html

https://console.developers.google.com/

go get github.com/prasmussen/gdrive- go build -ldflags '-w -s' sudo mv gdrive /usr/local/bin/gdrive sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/bin/gdrive

entry.title: Regedit
entry.content: powershell Get-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run' powershell Get-ItemProperty 'HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run'
